is_nan: This function returns whether a given variable is <tt>NaN</tt> (not a number) or not, returning <tt>true</tt> if it is, and <tt>false</tt> if it is not.

{ANY_CODE} if is_nan(global.value)
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}show_debug_message("Value is not a number");
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code checks the global variable "value" to see if it is a number or not and shows a debug message if it isn't.
